body:
This guy as 5th pick demanded not to supp or will troll and you be the judge if I overstep the name and shame. I enclosed here two screnshots. Out to ruin others' game right from the start. I might get criticise for this, but there is no other way that is effective

extra http://gyazo.com/ff2af547f54caa3a1e8f7319d6c5a846

replies.body: lol, posting this sort of thing doesn't really do anything though. If someone is a huge problem for you though, you can screenshot it and report them through support.
Tried. Support ticket jsut ask me to report in-game. But how do u start playing  a game like that?

Just ignore it when it says to report in-game. Riot failed with providing a way to report people for behaviour through support tickets, if you send one in though they should forward it to the behavioural team.

Well it looks like someone dodged the game because it isn't in your game history.

While i think this sort of behaviour is pretty poor, i also think it was his way of saying "guys i cant support" 


What surprises me tho, is rather than take the effort and offer to support. you put more effort into getting screen-shots and condemning this person on the forums.

**2 wrongs don't make a right.**




And on a side-note

Support is one of the most critical roles in the game, a good support wins the game before the team even realises it.
Yes someone dodged bcoz of this %%%%head.
or maybe they dodged cause your abusive... who knows..
but did he actually troll? or did he just threaten to.

-> Lose 3lp instead of 25lp for playing with that kid trolling
-> /profit

"screenshot ---> forum"

Except the forums are read only... RIP in pieces.
